cab.content: SECRET.fhis Document Is the Property otBATTLE SITUATION - EVENING - 4th MY, 1915.1. There Is no change in the general situation.No infantry attacks developed after this morning's bombardment *2. As a result of a minor operation the French advanced their line slightly south of LOCRE, and cleared the tfood south-west of LOCREHOP FARM of the enemy, capturing about 60 prisoners.General Staff,War Office, S.Tr.l. 4th Hay, 1918,Issued at 6 p*m.Fop the-personal morn
